text: so he returned to Jezreel to recover from the wounds they had inflicted on him at Ramah 22:6 Ramah is a variant of Ramoth; see verse 5. when he fought against Hazael king of Aram. Then Ahaziah 22:6 Some Hebrew manuscripts, LXX, Vulgate, and Syriac (see also 2 Kings 8:29); most Hebrew manuscripts Azariah son of Jehoram king of Judah went down to Jezreel to visit Joram son of Ahab, because Joram had been wounded.
